title: Chicken
subtitle: The poultry known most to man
desc1: Gallus gallus, the scientific name for chicken, is easy to be bred and relatively cheap. It is easily distinguishable, and can be prepared as a entree, main meal and also as a side dish. Originated from India, chickens are the most widely domesticated fowl in the world.
desc2: Other than being bred for its meat, chickens are also bred for its eggs, which are just as delicious.
